pullrequest.title: [Feat] Integrate branch gmacario/dev03
pullrequest.description:
* Add section "\[env\]"
* new-framework-arduino-mbed: Start porting to msysgit
* Gracefully handle case when sudo is not installed
* Trying sebromero/pmic-fix
* Set default\_envs=release
* Move definitions to common \[env\] section
* Selectively enable a few additional features
* accel\_sample\_t: Store only a 16-bit deltat\_us

    This should save some memory to allow 2x items in accel\_data\[\]


* Update after renaming first column to "delta\_us"
* Reduce delays, reset capture\_start\_us after throttle
* Move troubleshooting commands into a separate section

‌
